data.text: Rêngsukmuna ânsung ngâipu kut changtieng han lekhazuot ku mua; maha kângnika ânziek mohôr sari ngei mohôr ânnam leta ânthom ani.5:1: Ezek 2:9-10; Isa 29:11
Vântîrton râttak ku mua, rôl inringtakin, “Tu mo aminpipna mo-onga, lekhazuot ha aphar thei rang ni zoi?” tiin tânghâi ku mu sa.
Aniatachu invâna, pilchunga aninônchu rammuol nuoia5:3: rammuol nuoia: Thina rammuol (1:18 en roh). khom tute lekhazuot mo-onga asûnga a en thei rang reng om mak ngei.
Lekhazuot hah a mo-onga, asûnga a en theiruo tute an om loi sikin ka chap ngungûia.

Hanchu upangei lâia inkhatin ko kôm, “Chap no roh. En roh! Juda jâta ikeibaknei, David richisuonpâra roiinpui han, a menea, male ama han aminpipna sari ngei hah akheka lekhazuot hah a mo-ong thei zoi,” a tia.5:5: Aph 49:9 Isa 11:1,10

Hanchu Belrite hah rêngsukmun alâitak han ânding ku mua, iring parân minli ngei le upangei hah arihîla an om ani. Belrite that sai anghan ânlanga. Maha rikingei sari le mitngei sari a dôna, ma ngei hah Pathien ratha sari ngei pilchung pumpuia tîra om ngei hah an ni.5:6: Isa 53:7; Zak 4:10
Belrite hah a sea male rêngsukmuna ânsung ngâipu kut changtieng renga lekhazuot hah ava lâk zoia.

Ma anghan a thoa anîn chu, iring parân minli ngei le upa sômnikleiminli ngei han serânda le rângkachak khuriâingei mirimhoia sip chôi pakin Belrite makunga han an inboka, ma ngei hah Pathien mingei chubaithonangei ani.5:8; Lap 141:2
Anni ngei han lâ thar an thoa:5:9: Lap 33:3; 98:1; Isa 42:10
Kin Pathien sintho rangin rêngrama ochaingei ni sin ngei zoi ani,5:10: Jôk 19:6; Chph 1:6
Ko hong en nôka, male vântîrtonngei rôl ki rieta, isâng tamtak le isângrazasôm tamtak an ni! rêngsukmun rihîla han an indinga, iring parân minli ngei le upangei khom an om sa,5:11: Dan 7:10
male rôl inringtakin lâ an thoa:
Male invâna, pilchunga, rammuol nuoia, le tuikhanglien sûnga iring parânngei murdi vânnuoia iring murdi ngei le lâ an thoa:
Iring parân minli ngei han, “Amen!” tiin an thuona, male upangei han inbokin chubai an mûk zoi.
